pages.text: Everyone desires a beautifully furnished abode, and witches are no exception. This section gathers information on several purely decorative items that any practitioner can craft without much effort and use to embellish their dwelling. All items described below can be picked up into inventory by Shift+Right-clicking without destruction.

A beautiful crystal ball on a golden stand will adorn any fireplace mantle or altar. Generally, this ball may reveal astonishing magical properties in the future, so it can only be considered a purely decorative block temporarily.

A golden chandelier is a splendid light source when tired of torches, lamps, and ordinary candles. After placing it, light it with a flint and steel. When light is no longer needed, it can be extinguished by Shift+Right-clicking.

pages.title: Skull on a Stick
pages.text: What could be more elegant than a skull on a stick? Macabre anatomical pieces are beloved decorations among wizards, especially favored by swamp witches. Display this to unwelcome guests to show them what awaits if they take another step toward your hut.
